name: Slingshot (Epsilon Five)
description:
We are a team of five students who had fun creating their first game 'Slingshot'. If you enjoyed playing our game, we'd love to receive a review to let others know what you liked about the game or tell us how we can improve it in the future!

Developer's note: The online version of this game is still in the beta-phase and may contain some issues regarding the soundquality.  Please download the PC version for a flawless experience.
